data.name: lblTitle.Help
data.value: Enter a name for the Document

data.name: lblUrl.Help
data.value: Select the Url for the Document

data.name: lblDescription.Help
data.value: Enter a description for the Document

data.name: lblCategory.Help
data.value: Enter a category for the Document

data.name: lblOwner.Help
data.value: Select the owner of the Document

data.name: lblSortIndex.Help
data.value: Enter a sort index for the document. You can use sort index as a sort criteria in the module settings page.

data.name: SortIndex.Invalid
data.value: Sort index must be an integer.

data.name: DocumentLinkWarning.Text
data.value: You specifу an empty document link, or detected potential permission issue with the target asset. This could happen e.g. then the module is configured to allow viewing by certain role(s), while the document's target file doesn't. Press the "Edit" button to fix it.

data.name: lblForceDownload.Help
data.value: If selected this will force the file to be downloaded by the client. Helpful to prevent documents from opening in the users' browser.

data.name: lblLinkAttributes.Help
data.value: Use this to define custom HTML attributes (e.g. microdata) for document link in the attr1;attr2="value" format.

data.name: lblUrlTracking.Help
data.value: Displays URL tracking (audit) data for this document.

data.name: lblCreatedDate.Help
data.value: Enter date and time of document creation or leave empty to select current date and time.

data.name: lblLastModifiedDate.Help
data.value: Enter date and time of last modification of the document. This value will be updated automatically when document link is changed. Leave empty to select current date and time.

data.name: CannotSelectFolder.Text
data.value: Cannot select folder "{0}" - you could still try to select it manually.

data.name: lblStartDate.Help
data.value: Enter the date from current document should be published on the site.

data.name: lblEndDate.Help
data.value: Enter the date from current document should be removed from publication on the site.

data.name: Delete.Text
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this document?

data.name: DeleteWithAsset.Text
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this document with the associated asset (file or URL)? Note that resource will be deleted only if it's not referenced by other documents.

data.name: DocumentDeleted.Format
data.value: Document "{0}" was deleted. You can restore it by pressing "Add" button.

data.name: DocumentDeletedWithAsset.Format
data.value: Document "{0}" was deleted with related asset (file). You can try to restore it by pressing "Add" button.
